game.name: PAYDAY 2: The Golden Grin Casino Heist
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, 협동, 온라인 협동, 다운로드 가능한 콘텐츠, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, Steam 트레이딩 카드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Las Vegas is a Desert Mirage, a Jewel Amongst the Sands.The Golden Grin Casino Heist DLC is the 24th DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and is the final contract from the Dentist. She boasts more Five Diamond hotels than any other city in the world. Her shine and sparkle attracts tens of millions of dreamers eve

She boasts more Five Diamond hotels than any other city in the world. Her shine and sparkle attracts tens of millions of dreamers eve
